messages.message: hey team, do we have a feature flag on the roadmap for AI Hub admins to disable users' abilities to use chat apps and only be able to develop build apps? Citi is working with their internal teams to create guardrails around their use of LLMs, and this ability would help them stay within their standards while streamlining the enablement of their teams on AI Hub.
CC: @hannah do we have the framework for this kind of selective access between Automate and Analyze?

Currently the only site wide configuation is to enable/disable personal workspaces - this is being included in the granular roles PRD by @jack.robbins. We don't currently have the abity for admins to disable specific parts of the platform (chat/search) and we should align on whether we want this behavior from a product perspective as it may significantly hinder adoption
